Operating income before depreciation and amortisation (EBITDA) as a percentage of revenues / Weighted average / Non-financial listed groups / Germany / Groups with a focus on the services sector / Profitability / Seasonally adjusted

General: Non-financial groups listed in Germany, which publish IFRS consolidated financial statements on a quarterly basis and make a noteworthy contribution to value added in Germany. Excluding groups in real estate activities.
Source: Source of the unadjusted figures: Bundesbank calculations based on data from consolidated financial statements.
